hero.description: My mission is to create innovative and efficient web solutions. Together, we will take your ideas to the next level.

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a Full Stack developer, I am 20 years old and I live in Buenos Aires. Since I was 12 years old, I have a great passion for technology and software development, I started my career self-taught, I have experience as an electronic technician, web developer and LiDAR analyst. I am studying a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and graduated from I am Henry.

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: I worked and supervised more than 10 web development projects, such as Full Stack, CMS, low-code, electronics and home automation projects. I have worked with more than 120 people throughout my career and as a Team Leader, I have managed teams of between 8 and 14 people, I have always adapted satisfactorily to different environments and people.

work.title: Discover my approach to web design and development
work.description: Each project represents a challenge that I approached with dedication and creativity, and that allowed me to acquire new skills and knowledge.

resume.description: From the age of 12, I immersed myself fully in the world of self-taught software development. roles I played diverse, such as electronic technician, LiDAR analyst and Web developer. I am studying a Bachelor's degree in Computing. I believe that every day is a new opportunity to learn and grow.

footer.title: Do you have something in mind?
footer.description: I want to be part of your team! Contact me now.

reviews.author: Fabian Pacheco
reviews.text: From my experience working with him on the Beat Connect project I can say that he is a great designer, with great creativity and a high level of web development. I can also say that he is a fairly experienced person in front-end and I have noticed that it has no difficulty in solving bugs or problems that may arise during development.

reviews.author: Juan Villalba
reviews.text: I'm sorry if anyone has doubts about Thomas' potential. He is a very high-level professional, has very good criteria in UX/UI. He knows how to modularize code impeccably and understands very well the processes and tasks he must execute. I have been fortunate enough to supervise his work and he has done nothing but grow. The company that is lucky enough to have him in its ranks will undoubtedly win.

reviews.author: Lucas Regner
reviews.text: Good technical quality to develop in the frontend. Great technical level of code. Excellent handling of Figma and UX/UI design.
